titles.title: FREED Act
Fentanyl Reduction Engrained by Economic Deterrence Act
FREED Act
To amend the Fentanyl Sanctions Act to strengthen the imposition of sanctions under that Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committees on Foreign Affairs, the Judiciary, and Oversight and Accountability, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
